metadata.title: CVE-2021-47301 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: igb:Fix use-after-free error during reset Cleans the next descriptor to watch(next_to_watch) when cleaning the TX ring. Failure to do so can causeinvalid memory accesses. If igb_poll() runs while the controller is resetthis can lead to the driver try to free a skb that was already freed. (Thecrash is harder to reproduce with the igb driver, but the same potentialproblem exists as the code is identical to igc)

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
linux-laptop package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
